response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it could be an invaluable asset to you as well. We understand its worth to you might be even higher at $1,200,000. To facilitate this transaction and ensure both parties benefit, we propose a fair offer of $950,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also allows for a reasonable margin for us, ensuring the sustainability of our business. We look forward to discussing this proposal further and hope to see this remarkable product contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
